CustomField.description: Property owner who enters into a lease agreement with a tenant, also known as the lessee. This agreement grants the lessee the right to use the property for a specified period in exchange for rent payments.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Property owner who enters into a lease agreement with a tenant, also known as the lessee. This agreement grants the lessee the right to use the property for a specified period in exchange for rent payments.
CustomField.label: Lessor
